channel.title: Server status page shows OFFLINE
channel.description:
My server status page used to be 96% until randomly one day the site decides to say that my server has been offline. I didn't care anymore for awhile but now that it's at 82% or something I'd like it back to normal.
If you can't put the % back that's fine but could you atleast tell me why it's saying were offline? I can link you to the runelocus page and it says were online, and you can even go on the server itself if you want. :S
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=justsopro.no-ip.info
Thanks, Alexlr10

item.title: Server status page shows OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @IsolatioN IsolatioN
item.description:
@IsolatioN wrote:

If your using no-ip it can sometimes mess up causing it to appear offline.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page shows OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @killadragz14 killadragz14
item.description:
@killadragz14 wrote:

Well mopar takes a little a lot longer than other sites to check to use if that port is working or not.
Wait about 3 minutes or so and it should show up online, if not than it might be getting blocked by your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page shows OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:275446”]Q: Your page shows my server as offline, when it is actually online because me and my friends are on it.

       A: Just because your server is online for you or your friends, doesn't mean it is online for my server or others.  There could be network congestion between our two servers, or even a break in the internet that hasn't been routed around yet.  Also my script must check sometimes 1000+ servers every 30 minutes, so it can't spend valuable time waiting for a response from you, if you don't respond in the given time it marks you as offline.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Server status page shows OFFLINE
item.dc:creator: @Alexlr10 Alexlr10
item.description:
@Alexlr10 wrote:

whackatre:

Mopar can’t connect to it.

Yeah but why when other toplists can?

Read full topic

item.description:
